system.description:
Tied to the natural world, Dryads and Shroomlings embody the balance between flora and fauna. Their unique physiology releases toxic spores when harmed, providing a natural defense against thosewho dare to harm them.

Danger Pollen/Spores

Whenever an enemy causes you one or more Wounds, you excrete soporific spores: all adjacent enemies are Dazed.

You know Elvish if your INT is not negative. [M]
